thread.title: Danny Welbeck and Francis Coquelin commentate over Arsenal forward's dramatic last-minute goal against Leicester
thread.title_full: Danny Welbeck and Francis Coquelin commentate over Arsenal forward's dramatic last-minute goal against Leicester

author: Thomas Bristow
title: Danny Welbeck and Francis Coquelin commentate over Arsenal forward's dramatic last-minute goal against Leicester
text:
Get Arsenal FC   Thank you for subscribing!   
When Danny Welbeck scored in the 95th minute against Leicester last season every Arsenal fan inside the Emirates that day thought they would go on to win the league. 
The goal had a bit of everything. 
It was scored by the substitute who had just come back from injury. 
It was in the last scrapings of normal time. 
It meant Arsenal beat the league leaders and pulled the gap between them and Leicester back to just two points. 
Drama. Drama. Drama. 
Which is probably why Welbeck himself and teammate Francis Coquelin were tasked with commentating over this particular goal. Coquelin and Welbeck commentate on Welbeck goal 
And just like you'd imagine, the video is hilarious. 
Both players squeal when the goal goes in, and then Coquelin provides an in-depth analysis of Welbeck's celebration. poll loading Can Danny Welbeck work his way back into Arsenal's starting line-up? 500+ VOTES SO FAR
